description: List all exports for current user. Accepts optional ExportFilterInput with status (enum: PENDING, PROCESSING, COMPLETED, FAILED, CANCELLED), limit (Int, default 100), offset (Int, default 0). Returns ExportConnection with items (array of Export with id, name, status, progress, totalRecords, downloadUrl, s3Key, exportType, createdAt, updatedAt, completedAt), total, limit, offset, hasNext, hasPrevious. Download URLs are presigned S3 URLs. User isolation enforced - users can only view their own exports.
graphql_operation: query ListExports($input: ExportFilterInput) { exports { exports(input: $input) { items { id name status progress totalRecords downloadUrl createdAt } total hasNext } } }
